quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; The wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world. Someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Allan K. Chalmers

quotes.quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The key to happiness is good health and a bad memory
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: The greatest joy of life is to love and be loved.
quotes.author: R.D. Clyde

quotes.quote: Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Happiness is the settling of the soul into its most appropriate spot.
quotes.author: Aristotel

quotes.quote: Happiness is unrepentant pleasure.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Happiness is not about getting what you want all the time, its about appreciating what you already have.
Find your happiness not just in the big moments of life but in every little one.
Beauty might bring happiness, but happiness always brings beauty
A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't put the key to your happiness in someone else's pocket.
The key to happiness is your inner freedom, peace, and willingness to enjoy every moment of your life.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
quotes.author: Izabella Scorupco

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore

quotes.quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them.
True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry

quotes.quote: The happiness you feel is in direct proportion to the love you give.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of activity.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.quote: Happiness is an accident of nature, a beautiful and flawless aberration.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness.
Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
quotes.author: John Barrymore
